BNC User Reference Guide

<pause>

pause a pause either between or within utterances.
Class model.divPart.spoken att.timed
Declaration 
element pause { att.timed.attribute.dur, empty }
Attributes
(Global attributes and those inherited from [att.timed ] )
Example
 <s n="199"
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">
  <w c5="UNC" hw="erm" pos="UNC">Erm </w>
  <pause dur="10"/>
  <w c5="AV0" hw="right" pos="ADV">right </w>
  <w c5="AV0" hw="now" pos="ADV">now</w>
  <c c5="PUN">, </c>...</s>
; ;
Module spoken
